select k.kincode, k.sido, s.sigungu, k.kinname, kk.kinkind, k.kinroom, k.kinmax, k.kincurrent, k.kinteacher, k.kinhome, k.kincode2 from kindergarten k, kinkind kk, sigungu s where k.sigungucode=s.sigungucode and k.kinkindcode=kk.kinkindcode and k.kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%') and k.kinmax between #{i}
order by s.sigungu, k.kinname, kk.kinkind

select k.kincode, k.sido, s.sigungu, k.kinname, k.kinaddress, k.kinphone, kk.kinkind, k.kinroom, k.kinmax, k.kincurrent, k.kinteacher, k.kinhome, k.kinla, k.kinlo, k.kincode2 from kindergarten k, kinkind kk, sigungu s where k.sigungucode=s.sigungucode and k.kinkindcode=kk.kinkindcode and k.kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%') and k.sigungucode=#{sigungucode} order by s.sigungu, k.kinname, kk.kinkind
select * from cfres_summary where cfcode=#{cfcode} and cfresdate=#{cfresdate}
mapper.insert: insert into cafe_reservation(cfcode, gcode, cfresdate, adultsnum, kidsnum) values(#{cfcode},#{gcode},#{cfresdate},#{adultsnum},#{kidsnum})
mapper.select: select g.gcode, g.memid, g.grelation from member m, guardian g where m.memid=g.memid and m.memid=#{memid};

select cr.cfrescode, cr.confirtime, kc.cfimg, kc.cfname, kc.address, cr.cfresdate, cr.adultsnum, cr.kidsnum, kc.cfcode from cafe_reservation cr, kidscafe kc where cr.cfcode=kc.cfcode and gcode=#{gcode} order by cr.confirtime desc
select cfrestime from cafe_restime where cfrescode=#{cfrescode} order by cfrescode
